title: Test
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 18 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year

Inflation rate compared to previous year is rapidly increasing from 2004 to 2005, roughly constant from 2005 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2013, rapidly increasing from 2013 to 2019, roughly constant from 2019 to 2020, gradually decreasing from 2020 to 2021, gradually constant from 2021 to 2023, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2023 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Max Inflation rate compared to previous year about 54.44 was recorded at Year 2019
Min Inflation rate compared to previous year about 4.42 was recorded at Year 2004
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 18 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2019 to 2024.
But, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2011 to 2019.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2006 to 2009.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2011.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2004 to 2006.
